meta.name: description
meta.content: I am a Software Engineer at Adaca, specialising in Backend Development. I excel in creating scalable applications and delivering clean code that exceeds expectations. In my free time, I like to play around with Functional Programming; at the moment, I'm learning about Elm, Linux, and more on Backend stuff.
